BOT_ABOUT: Discord bot to make anonymous confessions into a channel.
CMD_PERMISSION_ERROR: :exclamation:You do not have permission to use this command! Please contact an admin if you believe this to be an error.
COMMAND_ON_COOLDOWN: You have been rate limited! Please wait before sending another command.
COMMAND_EMPTY_USER_ID: Please provide the user ID. To grab someone's ID, enable developer options in appearance, right click their username and click "Copy ID"
NO_RESULTS: This command has returned no results. This likely just means you haven't added anything.
CONF_SENT: :heavy_check_mark:Your message has been sent! Click in this box to view the message.
